name: FreeFall (itch) (Thomas Sauerzapf, Luky_Nocker, BernhardR, Niklas Schmidt, HerrDrops, Tazzy, MaeDaeryn, chiara.marker, SkaOArts)
name_original: FreeFall (itch) (Thomas Sauerzapf, Luky_Nocker, BernhardR, Niklas Schmidt, HerrDrops, Tazzy, MaeDaeryn, chiara.marker, SkaOArts)
description:
Free Fall is a cartoon-style action game in which you are jumping out of an airplane and have to dodge approaching obstacles. But thats not enought for achieving a good ending! Along the way you will encounter some crazy animals that need your advice. Decide wisely!

Controller:

Move: W,A,S,D

Choose Anwser: Arrow Key
